description: Erection of a single storey side, rear and part first floor extension
decision_conditions: Development  shall  be  carried  out  in  accordance  with  the  materials  specified  on  the approved plans and on the application form unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.
The development hereby permitted shall begin before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.Reason: This is required by Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990.

The finish floor level of the proposed single storey rear extension shall be no lower than the finished floor level of the existing dwellinghouse.Reason: To mitigate against potential flood risk in compliance with Policy DM4 (Water Management and Flood Risk)) of the 2012 Local Development Framework Core Strategy.
Condition 5 (Refuse Storage Facilities) - Officers have reviewed the infomation provided and are satisfied this can now be approved.

I acknowledge receipt of your payment for £ 116.00, the fee required for this application is £234.00, therefore please forward the outstanding balance of £118.00 as soon as possible.Note: Payment can be made via either our Contact Centre on 0208 547 5002, by cheque made payable to Royal Borough of Kingston upon Thames or online via the Kingston council website.
